field.label: Condition Logic
field.helptext: By default, all conditions will be enforced on queries. However, custom logic can be used to allow for results to be returned if only some conditions are met.

field.label: Batchable
field.helptext: Default setting for model: if false, do not group requests for this model with other requests.

action.label: if type is updated to blank or fieldvalue, clear the value
If type is user attributes and value is blank, pre-populate value

field.label: Condition Logic
field.helptext: By default, all conditions will be enforced on queries. However, custom logic can be used to allow for results to be returned if only some conditions are met.

field.label: Batchable
field.helptext: Default setting for model: if false, do not group requests for this model with other requests.

field.label: Constrain field values to picklist entries

action.label: if field is picklist or mutipicklist, query picklist entries

skuid__button.label:
Currently unable to save changes
One or more issues on this page are preventing Skuid from saving your progress. Make sure you are connected to the internet and check your table for validation issues.

Saving in progress
All changes in the Database Console are automatically saved as you work.

Changes have been saved
Youre all set! All changes in the Database Console are automatically saved as you work.
